snippet: Norway’s public broadcaster was set to broadcast 12 hours of knitting starting Friday night, complete with sheep shearing and needle tips.
abstract: Norway's public broadcaster NRK is set to broadcast 12 hours of material about knitting, continuing history of quirky programming.
lead_paragraph: Norway’s public broadcaster was set to broadcast 12 hours of knitting starting Friday night, complete with sheep shearing and needle tips.

headline.main: Norway: Good Yarn for a Fall Night
headline.print_headline: Norway: Good Yarn for a Fall Night
